body.p: Guests can read data but are not allowed to create new database objects or edit them. Creatures will not be able to see the database objects with a visibility status set to Reader, Group, or Project if no status ( Reader/Updater) has been assigned to them. Similarly, guests can view the Lemma list and the Thesaurus database.
